column1: Uchi////I tried coming in on a Friday without a reservation.. Stupid me! I had to wait only an hour since it was just us 2. The bar is first come first serve
column2: and let me tell you.. the people there are vicious. Don't expect to sit there unless you want to shove someone out of the way. Service here is always 10/10 from your actual server to anyone else who brings you food.
